Custom logger to use with this client. Use null for default logger.

member.summary: Login using currently specified connection settings. Called automatically if AutoLogon is true.

member.summary: Logoff from the server, if currently logged in

member.summary: Iterates through the folder list and returns a list of matching folders. Can specify whether the name should match exactly or not.
member.param: Specify whether the name should match exactly

member.summary: Serializes the current state of the object model to the cache file. Should be called after modifying any messages or folders

member.summary: Synchronizes the local cache with the server

member.summary: Helper method for recursively adding all folders from the source folder structure into the flat list

member.summary: Loads the specified local cache into the object model

member.summary: Creates a new sub-folder under this folder

member.summary: Shortcut method for logging information to the Console and optionally, a log file.
